amendment.description: To clarify the application of Presidential action under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3151 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 101.

action.text: Amendment SA 3151 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S5522-5523; text: CR S5522) To clarify the application of Presidential action under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act.
